artist: Maker: Philip Gallo; Printer: Philip Gallo; Publisher: Hermetic Press, Minneapolis
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: the words "My lipstick. . . From his lips. . . To your teeth. . .Yup!' in the shape of a pair of lips are printed in red Californian Italic typeface in the center of the sheet; the outline of a cigarette projects from the right side of the lips with the words "Or was it Yuk? They both laughed." printed in green ink on the side of the cigarette; stored with four other prints in an orange Canson folder with "5 Visual Poems / scott helmes karl kempton ian hamilton finlay philip gallo jonathan williams" in letterpress on front
title: 5 Visual Poems
